website_summaries.verdict: Comfortably designed front range harness offering 2 options to attach a leash.
pros: Highly reflective for night walking and heavily padded
Good for dogs who are pullers
Clips on top for no hair pinching
cons: May not be durable enough for larger, heavier dogs

customer_reviews.title: Good Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a good harness. It took me a hot minute to figure out how to adjust it, but now it's good to go. My Comet would always pull on the first leg of our walk due to excitement, but with the leash attached to the front clip this is no longer an issue. My arm is thankful! I used a little female ingenuity and looped the leash through the back handle to keep it from being tangled under his front legs. I've included a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Debbers

customer_reviews.title: This harness is amazing! Believe me I have bought many no pull ...
customer_reviews.text: This harness is amazing! Believe me I have bought many no pull harnesses which were considerably more expensive but this one is the only one that is easy to put on and off and my 75 lb Golden Retriever does not pull me at all! I had a total knee replacement a year ago so it is important for me to have control of my big pup! Worth every penny. I am finally enjoying our walks. Thanks for such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great harness, just be careful of measurement and dog hair length
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best harnesses I have tried on my dog. One issue is the threads on the inside can catch hair so it depends on your dog hair length. Another issue is measurement chart is off. Go atleast one size up and try, may have to go two sizes up, it depends. Otherwise it is a great product overall. Very durable, handle on the back comes in handy more than expected, D-ring (where you hook the leash) is double stitched so pulling issue is accommodated, front D-ring has double loop and works for no-pull training but D-ring on back is comparatively much more stronger.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: So damn cheap
customer_reviews.text: The D-ring broke the first time i used it. Hooked it on the chest ring and its useless because it twists on the dog (yes its adjusted correctly) and it almost slips off when he backs out. Pay a little more for one in the store. Doesnt seem like thelis company cares about your pet, just their pockets
customer_reviews.author: Dave Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, hard to adjust, also terrible to work with in terms of customer service
customer_reviews.text: This harness is hard to adjust and the front can't be adjusted properly for my dog, who is large with a narrow ribcage. It doesn't help with tugging and he's not much of a tugger anyway, so if your dog is, this will not help. The materials seem sturdy and the stiching is in good shape. Also, I had endless problems with shipping and the Amazon reps could only tell me this was an independent company and they couldn't give me any contact info or any help or better information. I would stay far away.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome harness.  Adjust very easy.
customer_reviews.text: We love this dog harness. When we first put it on our dog, Zoey, it seemed really big. But it was so easy to adjust. Sometimes dog collars or harnesses are a pain to adjust. This one was not. I was surprised how easy it was. And then it fit her super snug and perfect . She is a medium sized dog. She loves to pull, especially when going for bike rides. This makes it so much easier, she can still pull but it doesn't choke her. This is made with great quality and I would recommend it to anyone. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Heather Raak

customer_reviews.title: Quality, durability and reliability in a first class product
customer_reviews.text: I especially love the durability and quality of this product that has lasted for more than a year without failure. I bought this replacement because of the aged look and some of the edge stitching was beginning to pull off. For my rugged 65 pounder it's the best. I bought a different color by another brand and it totally failed in less than two weeks on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel White-Odudua

customer_reviews.title: The title is a lie! These are definitely not No- Pull harnesses!
customer_reviews.text: Best No-Pull Dog Harness MY @$$!! I was really excited to get these. As a pregnant woman with two puppies, I wanted to be able to take them on a walk separately to train them not to pull. Well, these harnesses did nothing. They didn’t stop either of them from pulling AT ALL and made a fool of me when I was dragged around the neighbor by my dog. I’ll give them the fact that they are decent harnesses but definitely don’t prevent pulling and my puppies aren’t even that big. Worst purchase I ever made unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rae Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness, just didn’t fit my dog’s body properly
customer_reviews.text: Nice harness but just didn’t fit my barrel-chested Pit bull properly. It caused chafing under his front legs because it really didn’t stop him from pulling , it just pulled sideways instead. I have ended up using a head halter which worked so much better. I’m keeping the harness for times I want to use both methods of attachment but it didn’t keep my dog from pulling (the front hook) which was why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Now that she has filled out a bit it fits like a dream
customer_reviews.text: My dog wasn't able to wear it much when I first got it. She was too narrow in the chest and attaching the leash to the front ring pulled the harness sideways. Now that she has filled out a bit it fits like a dream!! I only wish the rings to attach the leash were metal instead of plastic. Still, my dog is super active and this harness makes her visible and is comfortable for anything we get up to!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This harness is probably the best bang for you buck
customer_reviews.text: I've had my pup wear this since he was a puppy. This is actually my second one that I bought since he outgrew the first one. This harness is probably the best bang for you buck. I love that it's a vibrant color too so your doggo is super visible. It's very customizable in fit, and even though it looks small, it really hugs the dog in the right places. I absolutely love that it also has a front loop for pull-prevention. I highly recommend this for all types and sizes of puppers! (My dog is a 70lb German Shepherd mix)
customer_reviews.author: ACY89

customer_reviews.title: Good product, doggy approves
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't really pull (unless she sees a SQUIRREL, then all bets are off). I wanted a harness that looked good, was reflective and easy for me to get on her. This fits the bill nicely. Adjusting it was easy and it seems comfy. She was a little alarmed at first at having to slip it over her head but now it's not a big deal. She's a happy camper and I feel good knowing the reflecting stripes and bright orange color (along with sticking to the sidewalks) make her visible to traffic and keep her safe.
customer_reviews.author: EmilieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stops Pulling!
customer_reviews.text: I took one star off because this comes without instructions, and there are none on the manufacturer's website. I adjusted this until the neck part and the chest part were snug but not tight. I used the front hook, has I've seen other harnesses where the front hook is to prevent pulling. It worked like a charm. My dog is very strong (60 lb boxer-beagle mix) and always pulls. After trying to pull 2 or 3 times, he stopped and walked calmly by my side! I was hoping it would work, and it certainly did!
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, have a 7 month old Vizsla
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, have a 7 month old Vizsla, this stopped him pulling immediately. Took a bit to get it adjusted properly, but looks and works fantastic. I was able to use the top buckle after only a few minutes. The chest buckle is what corrected his pulling, but the leash kept going between his legs so was a pain to use. Top buckle is perfect, and no pulling. The reflector works well too.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Fits but not perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my 2 huskies. One is 50lbs the other is 70lbs. They do fit but are a tad short from front to back. Looks uncomfortable for the bigger one. The adjustment for the neck hole is right around the size that theguides for the straps interfere with the neck hole adjustment. It does fit well enough to walk them though. I am not disappointed with the purchase but I would probably get a different harness next time. Only for the sake of ensuring an accurate fit. This is the style I prefer with the routing of the straps. Can't find any like this at the box pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: kaldrok

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pulling immediately
customer_reviews.text: It's like a miracle! I placed this on my 1 year old Akita and she stopped pulling when I walked her immediately. She has never pulled since. Not sure it's even possible for her. I like that you can attach the leash to the chest portion of the harness. I think that helps. I'm not a dog expert or an expert on harnesses but I will say this was the best money I've spent.
customer_reviews.author: Zach's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love this harness!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I have a pit and a lab. Both dogs live their harnesses and are excited to get dressed for their walks. It is secure and I feel safe they won't slip out on me. Make sure you get the right fit. I have had for almost a year now and see no material fatigue. I hand wash as needed and let air dry. SUPER reflective. ***added note: Using the leash clip on the front works great to stop my pit mix from pulling!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie S.

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on and I have full control over ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! Only took me 4 years to realize that a harness was the way to go. Heavy duty, easy to put on and I have full control over my 2 -70 lb labs. They don't mind it, doesn't hurt them in any way and no more pulling!!!! People comment all the time on how well behaved my dogs are. And if I want to let them go off leash, the halter stays on, just disconnect the leash. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Beat harness
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years on my five dogs. One of my dogs always had a problem with harnesses. They rubbed under her front legs. I bought several before a friend reccomend these. You can hook it on top or in front. They are extremely sturdy and have a lot of room for adjustment. You can't beat the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Deans

customer_reviews.title: the quality of this harness was great. However
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the quality of this harness was great. However, it did not fit our dog despite measuring and ordering the corresponding size. We tried ordering a size L and XL, but the L was too small in the neck (fit in the chest) and the XL fit in the neck, but was too large in the chest. Bummer because it is nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Barnbine

customer_reviews.title: Cool beans
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my 45lb puggle. He is shaped like a giant pug -- so weirdly. Sometimes I had to tug is back on him so it sits right and doesn't really sit flat on his chest, but other than that, this is one of the best harnesses that we have. He can slip out if we try to use the front clip (but we don't have this VERY tight) and screams like he's dying when he can't pull. But sturdy, bright, and nice.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Nice! strong harness and keeps my Aussie from escaping!
customer_reviews.text: Have a 60 lb. Aussie who is an escape artist when it comes to collars and harnesses! She is clever and can back right out of one. Got this harness to help with pulling and escaping. It works!! No backing out of the harness since you can attach leash to the front ring or the back ring, and believe me, she tried!
customer_reviews.author: spoiledpup1

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible good quality dog harness for less than 20 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my beagle. The fit is just right and the adjustment range is generous. The harness is very good quality, after two years of everyday use and multiple machine washes it’s holding up perfect, all hardware and padding is fine, there’s no discoloration, just a little wear on the fringes which is absolutely expected. The bright color and light reflective webbings are highly visible when it’s getting dark and it looks attractive. It’s incredibly good value under $20. I would highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and works pretty well, and my big girl doesn't fight to get out of it, so I guess she finds it comfortable. Only issue is that even fit pretty snug, it wrenches to one side if my mastiff pulls on it with the leash attached in front. It still discourages lunging and pulling, but not in the way intended. I also really appreciate the handle on the back. Wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Styward

customer_reviews.title: Harness broke after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Update! This company has excellent customer service. I received a new harness the very next day after return info submitted. The harness itself is pretty sturdy. Our dog weighs 40 pounds and is quite a puller. We have had this harness for exactly one week and the hook on top of the harness where you clip the leash broke into pieces. See photo. This is a very strange thing to break. I believe we just got a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great harness!!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is great. I got it to use with the Walky-Dog device for riding a bike while walking the dog. I didn't pay much attention to the fact it says no-pull but he literally doesn't pull much with this harness. He does dip his head a lot to sniff everything though, but what dog doesn't? The only thing I don't care for, is the back straps run right behind the pack of the legs and it does bother the dog a little so I feel like if that was padded better, he'd like it a little more but overall, great product and i absolutely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This has been excellent for dog walking. My dog is about 40 pounds and this fits him well. I like how well made it is. It has many different adjustments you can make to get just the right fit. It also has the front lead so you can train a puppy. Also has top lead to walk older dog who knows how to walk well. It has reflective surface to help with night walking. I really like this harness and is well made. My dog cant slide out of it like so many other harness.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasan

customer_reviews.title: strong for travel
customer_reviews.text: I liked the construction of this harness. Our dog has a pace maker so nothing can be put around her neck. Love the orange color so I can see her in the woods. also love the handle on top to help her getting out of the tall pickup truck. I am not sure about why it seems to loosen up ....still adjusting for this - otherwise love the product
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bente

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My pup really likes this harness. I’ve been looking for a harness that he would like for months. This is the first one I get that he doesn’t roll in the floor as soon as I put it on. The material seems strong and durable, but it is light and breathable. I like the rings. The leash is great too. Not too heavy but strong enough for my 45lbs dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on today. It is a better quality harness than the one I bought at Walmart a few months ago. It fits more comfortably than the old one. The only problem with this one, is that the clearance on the top of the harness is higher with the tie out cable and swivel clip attached. He has some trouble getting in our doggie door, and into the house, and gets stuck. Yes it's a tight squeeze, and we should get a bigger doggie door, but he didn't have a problem before. Still a nice harness. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Finnman

customer_reviews.title: This vest had absolutely NO effect on my puppy's pulling ...
customer_reviews.text: This vest had absolutely NO effect on my puppy's pulling when walking him. I tried to use it for 3-4 weeks and there was never any improvement.The narrative in the description was it would deter a dog from pulling when he was walked due to it being uncomfortable to the dog if he continued to pull while being walked. I walked my dog 2 miles every day and he was never "bothered" by the vest when he pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Newman

customer_reviews.title: An arm-saver!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the harness for a couple of weeks now, and it's great! My boxer completely freaked out with a gentle leader, so I needed something to give me more control as she has no leash manners. This harness has done the trick! With the front leash hook, she instantly stopped pulling and now has great manners on her leash. This harness has been an arm-saver!
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin7

customer_reviews.title: Great dog harness. Go for a walk!
customer_reviews.text: Take your dogs for a walk! Seriously, get out there and go! Your dogs will thank you. We bought two of these and the colors were great, very visible and comfortable for the dogs. They were additional to halti collars so we could grab the handle in case we encountered other dogs on the road. Love these harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stupak

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.text: It fit, but walking with my dog in it was a joke. The thing would turn completely sideways the second my dog would try to pull and I didn’t want to make it any tighter because it was rubbing her armpits. We haven’t used it but once or twice. Now it’s just collecting dust. Maybe for a lesser strength dog or something it would work.. but not for my pit mix
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: The construction of this seems very good, we liked the fit on the dog however ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this seems very good, we liked the fit on the dog however based on sizing this harness had to be opened way up to accommodate the depth of our dog's chest, if you have a breed with a deeper chest cavity this may not be long enough to position the chest pad behind the dog's forelimbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend that if your dog has weird proportions (like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but my chubby dog was able to slip out right away. I ended up getting the Ruffwear harness with an extra strap going around the waist. I'd recommend that if your dog has weird proportions (like a big chest and a tiny neck).
customer_reviews.author: Autumn M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy On, Sturdy, Easy Off
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, but fun-sized Pittie has exploded through every other harness. This one is easy-on, easy off and quickly adjustable. The front ring keeps her from pulling, and the bright orange color keeps her visible.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reflectivity and well-built
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous harness which has really helped us assist our older dog when necessary up and down the front steps and since she's blind, it also helps us better guide her on a short leash. I love the reflective materials so that now if she wanders into the street in the night, there is high visibility for traffic around her.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hunting season.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with(they match so nicely) The dog (a broad-chested 55lbs boxer/hound mix) seems comfortable wearing it. The 3M reflective tape "glows" incredibly bright when illuminated. This harness is perfect for hunting season and winter's dark nights. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness.
customer_reviews.text: I have a husky pup 8 months old. I had 3 other harnesses, this is first one that controls her pulling. I also LOVE the ease of putting it on. I got the large. Pup is 42 pounds, I also have an 80 pound lab. I ordered the large... at smallest the harness goes, it fits the husky perfectly. At largest ( nearly , and she is broad ) it fits the lab just fine. Just to give you an idea on the size range. Very happy with purchase, I would recommend this harness.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: A better design would be to put a snap for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The opening is too small for the head to go through. If I make it bigger then the entire harness gets too big around the girth of the dog. A better design would be to put a snap for the head and click it shut in addition to the 2 snaps around the girth. Just a suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Afonso Wong

customer_reviews.title: Well made and well padded.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made product. I am particularly happy with the size of the chest piece and how well it's padded. I looked at several of the products and most have just a strap that goes under the chest. With my 15 yr old Lab -- and Labs typically have large chest areas -- I wanted something that had a wide and well padded chest piece to support her when I have to partially lift/support her; this harness has that. It seems to be fairly comfortable for her as well without binding under her front legs and rubbing in the armpits.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: Reordering because our dog bite through his old one when we left him at boarding. Fits him perfect and its adjustable. We ordered another one the same for our new dog.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Carrio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy harness. Fits my 57lb mutt well. I was worried that it would be a struggle to put this on him for his nightly walk, but it is really easy to put the harness over his head and snap the 2 side clips in place. Hank can pull on his leash when he sees a cat or other dogs, and he no longer chokes himself!
customer_reviews.author: txazn

customer_reviews.title: Product defective where front chest area of the harness it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product defective where front chest area of the harness it has a bulky bulge on one side where elastic is under flap. Uncomfortable for my dog to lay down. I just got it today and had him wear it for an hour so I could check for any problems. It was uncomfortable for him so I removed it. I'm notifying Amazon for free return due to defect.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Gastelum

customer_reviews.title: Measure carefully and then size up!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is off. I measured my dog carefully before purchasing and still had to return for a larger size for my 65 pound lean coonhound mix. The XL fit him perfectly though!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best harness
customer_reviews.text: This is the best harness for my dog,my dog is full of energy,crazy lab mix,only using this harness ,I could walk with him,so glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: JoyC

customer_reviews.title: We like it so much better than an around the neck ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't seem to pull as much with this harness. We like it so much better than an around the neck collar. She was continuously choking with other collars when she would see something she wanted to get to. We've had so much trouble over the years getting her not to pull and take us for a walk. This harness is SO much better! We're not completely there, but almost. It allows us so much more control.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy harness, but could use more reflective materials
customer_reviews.text: Good quality harness, but could use more reflective areas on it. I have this as a backup to my Hurtta Harness. They are very similar, but the Hurtta has much more reflective materials on it. And I want my dog as safe as possible! This are less money than the Hurtta, and not a bad alternate.
customer_reviews.author: handicapped shopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness!
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and took our dog out on it for the first time. It was an excellent fit and very adjustable. I ordered a Large and my dog is about 50 pounds. She was very comfortable and the material has reflective qualities along the edges. This is fantastic for our night walks! The harness seems very solidly built and so far I am extremely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great combo. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This harness and leash combo is an awesome deal. It fits my fur baby great. The leash is very smooth retracting and strong. The price is great and it is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: korena reyes

customer_reviews.title: The top harness point is great for keeping holding the dog back and not choking ...
customer_reviews.text: The top harness point is great for keeping holding the dog back and not choking with the collar and the bottom one was nice because it would turn her body. However it always seemed to slide just a bit and a few times it actually swept her legs out from under her.
customer_reviews.author: Redneck Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Large Size Questionable
customer_reviews.text: We have a boxer and not what I would consider to be a large dog. However we bought the large size and this just fits him. Any larger of a dog and the large size would be too small(like a lab or golden retriever). But our dog cannot escape out of this like he does with another brand we had tried.
customer_reviews.author: Millard

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is not an anti-pull harness. I have a different brand I got from petco and that one works. My dogs acted like it was a regular collar. I had to stop my run because it wasn't working. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: SRJ

customer_reviews.title: Best fit!
customer_reviews.text: This harness fits my dog perfectly and she seems very comfortable in it! I am extremely happy with it..and for the price, you can't go wrong! I will agree with other reviews that the straps are a little difficult to adjust, but once you adjust it for your dog's size, you shouldn't need to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbait790

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my basset hound and has made a huge difference in his pulling on our walks. I feel in much better control and like that it's not choking him. So far no rubbing/chafing issues. Makes our walks more fun. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Nice for no pulling!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog trainer reccomended this harness and I just tested this no pull harness for the first time and it works pretty great! When hooked in the front it definitely helps with the pulling, my dog loves to sniff EVERYTHING so she definitely finds ways to still pull, but it's more manageable with this harness and I'm glad we got it. I love that it has a handle on the back too. I reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this. The leash is amazing. My boy isn’t a big fan of harnesses but he didn’t fight me with this one.
customer_reviews.author: shelby strange

customer_reviews.title: Great harness, but does nto stop pulling
customer_reviews.text: My 65# setter-ish mutt does not seem to care about the "no pull" abilities of this harness. The harness just turns on her and she keeps pulling. I tried MANY adjustments. The only way it prevents pulling is if you put it on tight enough to prevent breathing, which is obviously not ideal. Decently made harness other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Michael

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this harness
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this harness. It fits my dog perfectly after minimal adjustments. He seems to pull less with it on and we use it on hikes. It is a very bright orange which is what I wanted. Something easily noticeable incase he did somehow get away. However, I guess he is Houdini reincarnate because he found a way to get out of it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this harness over any other one I have seen ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this harness over any other one I have seen or tried. I often get compliments about it from other dog owners, and I always suggest that they should buy one. it is sturdy and comfortable for my dog. The option of hooking on in the rear or on the front is nice, I usually use the rear, but if my pup is pulling a lot, I will switch the leash to the front hook and it prevents her from pulling. I am hoping that in the future there might be a few more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Doug boes

customer_reviews.title: If your measurement is close go a size up.
customer_reviews.text: My dog measured right on the line between medium and large. 26-27 inches. Got the medium and returned it because it wouldn't fit. But stayed with the same company and ordered the large and it fits perfectly. Easy on and off and he seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: Fits well!
customer_reviews.text: On my Chocolate Australian Retriever! It's nice that it has two clips on the sides to put it on and take it off. I also like that there is a leash loop in the from and on the back so you can lead from the front of back. I like the orange color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic harness at a great price
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I wish I had purchased this sooner. Fantastic harness at a great price. Fit and quality are great with lots of nice features. My dog enjoyed it from the first run in it. Way better than a traditional collar for running. Definitely helped with pulling too.
customer_reviews.author: pugapoo_owner

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed harness.
customer_reviews.text: The clips are over the harness, so you don't catch hair when you clip. Dog is a little sensitive, but loves her harness. The front loop is great for leash training, the top one is very to easy to clip to, and the handle comes in handy. Everyone at the dog park asks where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: I would give it more than 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I have an 80 pound bull that we recently adopted. They told us that he could not be walked because he pulled too much. Two days with this harness and he is walking great. I think it is acting as a Thunder Shirt and allows me great control. My wife is a thin woman and she is able to walk him also.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the most part, neck isn't very adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice harness and seems to work well so far. I just wish the neck was more adjustable. It only adjusts to a half inch or so, it seems. It fits a little loose around neck and allows the harness to turn to the side too easily.
customer_reviews.author: El Mariachi

customer_reviews.title: Dog is a puller works well
customer_reviews.text: my dog likes to pull so this works great love it
customer_reviews.author: roger assmann

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. I have a 52lb standard poodle and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 now as my dog has grown. It is very sturdy. I have a 52lb standard poodle and he doesn’t mind having it one. The picture shown is him wearing the small size when he was 20-30lbs, now he wears size medium.
customer_reviews.author: Mhobbs

customer_reviews.title: Best Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is the best harness hands down that I've ever owned. Fits great, I bought a medium for my 35lb collie, it was too small but the large fit him great. He is barrel chested so a medium would be fine if your dog is not built with a big chest. I really like the handle on the top and the reflectiveness of the harness. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tezak

customer_reviews.title: No Pull Harness
customer_reviews.text: This harness is a nice quality material, with reflective areas to use safely at night. When sizing if in doubt, I suggest ordering the next size up, although the harness is true to size. The only complication I've had is when you put it on or take it off. It goes over the dog's head snugly and is difficult to go over their collar. Recommend taking the collar off before putting the harness on or taking it off. It has two lead hooks, one in the front, one on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fancy likes the harness
customer_reviews.text: The harness makes the dog much more visible as she chases squirrels through the woods, which is also useful during hunting season. I have only used the back loop to attach a leash so I don't know about the "no pull"
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E. Lepoff

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Easy-ON, unlike the step-into types which require an unreasonable amount of doggy cooperation to put on. Slip over the head, bring straps up on the sides and clip, bingo - doggy is in harness with no fuss. Color is pleasing but also very bright for safety. Big plus for having leash clips on both front and top!
customer_reviews.author: Negril Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Buying our second one for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my Heeler, the reflective is noticeable and he seems comfortable in it. Unfortunately my dog ended up chewing through the strap, our fault should have been tighter. We are definitely going to go with this same harness as a replacement. Has a hook on the front and the back for a leash.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better than pricer brands
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this harness from a Kurgo harnessand the Best Front Range No-Pull Dog Harness. 3M Reflective Outdoor Adventure Pet Vest with Handle has outlasted the Kurgo. The Kurgo harness fell apart - seams ripped, the reflective areas peeled off, while this one has seen no damage. It is easy to clean and feels secure around our pup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 3 years and still in very good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: A great collar.
customer_reviews.text: Love this harnesses, easy on and off. No pulling or choking on our walks, and our pup can't pull out of it like she can with her collar. Keeps her safe.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Tough
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness my dog still pulls but not as much. I love the brightness of it I can find my dog when he is running around at the dog park. I love the handle my dog can be stubborn and at times does not want to jump in the car so i lift him by the handle and help him up. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Girlinsideout03

customer_reviews.title: Not great for strong pullers
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very strong, didn’t seem to fit well, stretched out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Ordered a L (27-32 inch chest measurement) for my dog who measures 28 inches. Adjusted to the largest possible width and it pinched her trying to clip it on. Measurements are not accurate. I will not be exchanging for the next size up as I’m not sure there would be room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: We love the front hook to keep him from pulling
customer_reviews.text: We went through a few harnesses for our 60 lb. pit mix. We love the front hook to keep him from pulling, and this one has been very durable. It is also really easy to put on, compared to past harnesses we had where he had to step into it. This one just goes over his head and clips around the sides. Have recommended it to many people!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Klein

customer_reviews.title: Does not help very much
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. I have a 70lb lab puppy. He still pulls when he is on a walk. We have this and a choke collar for him neither seems to help with the pulling very much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased two of these harnesses for my pups and I was nervous that they would be lower quality, but I was surprised! We looked into getting the ruffwear harness’s but they were so pricey. These harnesses work great! I was hesitant to purchase but I would buy them again if I needed to!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Hostetter

customer_reviews.title: Great harness! I really like that it has leash ...
customer_reviews.text: Great harness! I really like that it has leash clapses on the chest and the back as well as a handle. We use this harness with a hands free leash and it has worked out great! It was a little difficult to figure out how to make the harness tighter though...I almost gave up! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get to fit my Englisg setter.
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my dog. He is a English Setter with a 27" chest measurement. The back straps rub on his front legs and the harness is hard to pull off over the head. I think this would work for a wider chested dog but not for an English Setter.
customer_reviews.author: pablo espanol

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Harness
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these harness in October of 2016 they have held up extremely well through a lot of different weather elements. The reflective designs are wonderful. They only complaint I have is the stitching in two places between the arms can be a little pokie. Buying a harness every three years in my book is a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: As dog harnesses go, it's well made. But I have a Belgian Shepherd who knows how to back out of these and this one was no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness
customer_reviews.text: Our dog weighs between 65-70lbs and can often pull hard. Since using this product we are much better at controlling him and holding him back. The harness is easy to put on and with the different leash loops makes it idea. We also like that there is padding around the straps so they aren't pulling too hard on him. This harness is also nice is that our dog doesn't seem able to chew it while he's wearing it, we have had issues with other strap harnesses in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We hook the leash on the front and our husky no longer pulls. Update:still using this 2 years lader and it works great running 20+ miles per week.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Its a Dog harness, thats orange, and it works
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, and it makes my chocolate lab shine in the dark. She likes wearing it, it doesn't discomfort her on any walks or runs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Werner aka Dorlar

customer_reviews.title: Dog Harness
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our lab/collie mix and it woks great. No rubbing and he doesn't even notice it is on him.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, is durable, lightweight. Well made. Love the color. So far no issues with my dog, going after it. Has many good & useful features. Would recommend this one a winner!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect harness
customer_reviews.text: My 14-year old terrier appreciates not having me pull on his collar any more. Have tried other harness types and this one is the easiest for me to use. (Willie and his owner are both seniors). Love the orange color.
customer_reviews.author: Black Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Now he is much more comfortable and we can TRY to keep him from pulling ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what our dog needed as opposed to his collar and leash. A puppy but getting bigger and ohhhh so excited about everything... Now he is much more comfortable and we can TRY to keep him from pulling us :)
customer_reviews.author: Healthsuccess

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Have had this now for awhile and it is holding up GREAT . Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: camerashy

customer_reviews.title: too small for 80 pound lab
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality and the bright color, but it was too small for my 80 pound lab. She is wide in the chest area and has a thick neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Harness, GREAT value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog harness I have ever used. We have several JRT's and they can be hard on their equipment. This is easy on, and very secure. Adjustments are very easy and lock into place securely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good harness. I like that it has clips and ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good harness. I like that it has clips and the front and the back. Very easy to put on and take off. My only complaint is that it’s loose in places. And you can’t tighten the neck as much as you’d like. Also wish the material was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Its alright. Does its job, but as other reviews have mentions it is very difficult to adjust and it needs to be loosened and re tightened everytime I use because it wont slip over my dogs head.
customer_reviews.author: El-Dave-O

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong size. Ordered large for my golden but got medium. On the package there is an L overlaying an M. It fits my border collie perfect. But I didn’t really need one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EXPAWLORER Best No-Pull Dog Harnes Reflective Outdoor Adventure Pet Vest with Handle
feature_bullets: Color:orange,size M fit chest girth 22-27" Stylish ,Durable, Scratch-Resistant Oxford material outer layer,lightweight Draflex Buckle with large loading capacity which greatly improves tensile strength.Comfortable and ergonomi design ensures easy to fit and put on/take off.
Safety features include Nylon webbing with reflective material for Good visibility at night and Sturdy handle for easy seat belt attachment while riding in your car.
Comfortable lightweight Mesh lining with soft sponge padding in chest and belly.
Two leash attachment points: aluminum V-ring on the dog's back and reinforced webbing on the dog's chest.
Please refer to the size chart image for correct item dimensions.
